channel.title: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?
channel.description:
whats the line of code that will let me make NPC's shout things above there head?
EX: Npc saying "selling Runes"
and people would trade him, how could i do this and what .java or .cfg would i add this?
ok THANKS :]

item.title: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?
item.dc:creator: @codypwns codypwns
item.source: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?

item.title: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

omg easiest thing in the book. I have 474…so umm this might not work if u have 503+
ok fill the npc with what npc you want.
This is just for talking…not for spawning an npc.

Ok now open NPChandler.java
find

(npcs[i].npcType ==

ok when you find that, scroll down a little bit. You’ll se a bunch more of them.
Now put this in. You can change the npc number as i said b4 and what he says.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 520) { // general store manager in lumbridge if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Selling Runes!!!"; } }
that makes the lumbridge general store manager say “selling runes” randomly between 1 and 30 seconds between each time he says it.
spawning is in autospawn.cfg. THats easy to figure out… just put the coords. IF you want him to move do a 1 higher for range1x and range1y. Also put lower for rangex2 and rangey2. walk type is 1. Alrihgty i think that should help! :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 10:06:08 pm[/size][hr]sorry if thts unclear, but thats how I remember in my mind when i code it. I own bass-scape and opened like 3 stores just on June 1 in about 10 mintues. I"M PROUD OF MY SELF! ya so i got it in my head like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Like 'Rich said, learn the laguage. An ‘int’ is an integer, which is a number, which would be the NPCID. java.lang.String is the location of the native ‘String’ which is text, which would be the message.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

that’s not what i was asking, im saying

item.source: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?

item.title: Whats the code to make Npc's shout over there head?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == int) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = java.lang.String; } }

Read full topic
